title: Museo del Prado
knownFor: World-class Spanish art collection featuring masterpieces by Velázquez, Goya, and El Greco. One of the world's finest art museums.
ticketInfo: Part of the Paseo del Arte Card (€32.80 for all 3 museums - Prado, Reina Sofía, Thyssen). Free Mon-Sat 6-8pm, Sun 5-7pm (long queues, not recommended). Free for under 25s.
